Description:
Our Client is expanding their Restaurant and cafe' brands offering Arabic and international cuisine.A casual breakfast and brunch restaurant that offers an unparalleled experience in an innovative menu and an enchanting atmosphere. 
A new Concept bakehouse/espresso bar that brings an innovative dinning experience to the scene with its' community engaged experience & unseen before products. 
A B2B central bakery that specializes in bespoke and artisan goods.We are looking for Baristas, Executive Pastry Chef / Pastry Sous Chef, and bakers to join this exciting and expanding groupSkills
Skills:
2 to 5 years experience in Restaurants, Cafe's, Coffee shops or Catering services
Posses a high level of team work and ability to work independently
Energetic with excellent customer service skills
Creative
Passion for learning and developing
Excellent communication skills
Confident and outgoing
